thread.section_title: Greyhours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greyhours | greyhours.com
thread.title: Namchoke Sasikornwong

author: Namchoke Sasikornwong
title: Namchoke Sasikornwong
text:
I have been in touch with the customer service since my order was completed. I am impressed by their prompt response and the willingness to solve an issue. Today I have learnt that every customer support I have got is directly from a CEO himself, who has the patience and understanding to deal with my demand and offers an alternative resolution when needed.
I have been impressed by Greyhours' Carbon model at first sight on my Facebook newsfeed. Its simply elegant look has led me to learn more about its quality and the vision of the founders on the official website. As it turned out, I have decided to order one, which was dispatched within one working day as described.
I'm looking forward to receiving my first Greyhours watch the coming week and to further sharing my impression on the watch soon.
